head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ERICSON, JOHN M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ERICSON, JOHN M.

block.p: ERICSON-John M., 53, on May 9, 1997. Survived by mother Elizabeth Ericson, daughters Kathy Tari and Stephanie Ericson, granddaughter Alexis Dariya Tari, two brothers, two sisters, four nieces, and four nephews. Memorial services at First Presbyterian Church in New Orleans, May 24. Additional services, Corpus Christi TX, to be announced.
